long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmartATS is a powerful tool available as a browser extension for chrome browsers allowing users to source candidates (and leads) seamlessly from social media.



SmartATS currently supports LinkedIn Profiles. We plan to support other social media platform in future ( Github, Xing, Kaggle, Facebook, Bitbucket, Gitlab and much more.)



The functionalities that SmartATS offer are:



- Create Candidate Profile: (see screenshot)
Helps to create candidate profile from LinkedIn to SmartATS



- Map the candidate with job: (see screenshot)
Allowed to submit the created candidate profile with the respective job for internal review
- Save all profiles to your database: (see screenshot)
Make a search on Social Media and save all the profiles appearing in the search to your database on your favourite CRM/ATS.



- Export all profiles to CSV
Make a search on Social Media and export all the profiles to CSV.`
